txt.en:
'You have helped us greatly, and for that I am very thankful. I have one last thing to ask of you.

'The market will be opening tomorrow. I was hoping you would head up the road to Dwaling and let the hobbits there know that, thanks to some outstanding help, we are starting the market a little early this year.

'Just follow the road east from Oatbarton, and soon enough you will come to Dwaling. Find Hob Hillbrow and let him know.'
'I am very happy to hear that the market is starting tomorrow, but I fear we will not be able to make it. There is too much afoot here to leave.'
'If you do not let them know, we might as well not open yet! Hurry it up!'
The hobbits living in Dwaling will be eager to hear the Northcotton Farmer's Market is open for business.
Talk to Hob Hillbrow in Dwaling
Hob Hillbrow is at Dwaling, north-east of Oatbarton.\n\nAlbin Northcotton asked you to venture to Dwaling and let them know the farmer's market will be opening early this year.
